Class MedicineInventory

java.lang.Object
MedicineInventory
public class MedicineInventory extends Object
The `MedicineInventory` class manages the inventory of medicines in the system. It provides functionalities for adding, updating, and tracking medicines, as well as monitoring low-stock levels and maintaining a persistent record of inventory in a CSV file.

This class follows the Singleton design pattern to ensure a single, centralized instance of the inventory is used throughout the application.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static MedicineInventory getInstance(String filePath)
      Retrieves the singleton instance of `MedicineInventory`. If no instance exists, a new one is created using the specified file path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the file path to initialize the instance if it is not already created.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of `MedicineInventory`.

    • getMedicineNames

      public List<String> getMedicineNames()
      Returns:
      List

    • addMedicine

      public void addMedicine(String name, int initialStock, int lowStockAlert)
      Adds a new medicine to the inventory and appends it to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the medicine.
      initialStock - the initial stock level of the medicine.
      lowStockAlert - the low-stock alert threshold for the medicine.

    • getMedicineByName

      public Medicine getMedicineByName(String name)
      Retrieves a medicine from the inventory by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the medicine to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the `Medicine` object if found, or `null` if the medicine does not exist.

    • listAllMedicines

      public void listAllMedicines()
      Lists all medicines in the inventory along with their stock levels.

    • checkLowStock

      public void checkLowStock()
      Checks for medicines that are low on stock and displays warnings for each.

    • decreaseStock

      public void decreaseStock(String name)
      Decreases the stock of a specific medicine by 1 and updates the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the medicine whose stock will be decreased.

    • updateStock

      public boolean updateStock(String name, int quantity)
      Updates the stock level of a specific medicine and reflects the change in the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the medicine.
      quantity - the quantity to add (positive) or subtract (negative).
